products: Infection Control Antimicrobial Use and Resistance Reporting

export_format.description: Tab-separated value (TSV) files, one per table, native to Epic's Clarity reporting database. Non-tabular content (rich text documents, images) is exported as separate files referenced from the TSV tables.

clinical.evidence: Extensive clinical tables: 34 PATIENT tables, 160+ ORDER tables, 7 allergy tables, 10+ flowsheet/vitals tables, medication administration (MAR_*), problem lists, diagnoses, lab results, procedures, immunizations, and more.

secure_messages.evidence: 82 MyChart-related tables (MYC_CONVO, MYC_CONVO_ABT_MEDICATIONS, MYC_CONVO_ABT_MED_ADVICE, etc.), 16+ CHAT tables (CHAT_MESSAGE, CHAT_CONVERSATIONS, CHAT_MESSAGE_CONTENT), CAL_MESSAGE_* tables for internal messaging. Comprehensive portal messaging coverage.

billing_financial.evidence: 698+ billing-related tables including ACCOUNT (guarantor accounts with PB/HB balances), ACCT_TX (transactions), AP_CLAIM and 30+ claim subtables, ARPB_* (accounts receivable professional billing), HSP_TRANSACTIONS, charge tables, payment tables, collection agency history.

insurance_coverage.evidence: 215+ insurance-related tables including COVERAGE, BENEFITS, AUTHORIZATIONS (plus AUTHORIZATIONS_2), BENEFIT_EVALUATOR, eligibility tables, payer tables, capitation payment tables, plan identifiers.

appointments_scheduling.evidence: 56+ appointment/scheduling-related tables including visit tables, encounter tables, appointment request tables, scheduling tables.

documents_images.evidence: 67+ document/image-related tables including DICOM_MANIFEST, DICOM_DEFINITION, DICOM_IMAGE_WINDOW_INFO, attachment tables (CLM_ATTACH, AP_CLAIM_ATTACHMENTS), document reference tables. Landing page notes non-tabular content (documents, images) is exported as separate files.

audit_trails.evidence: 157+ audit tables including ORDER_AUDIT_TRL, FLOWSHEET_IMG_LINK_AUDIT, CONSENT_LINK_AUDIT, APPEAL_GRV_AUDIT_TRAIL, AN_DELETION_AUDIT, CHAT_ACCESS_LOG, CL_QANSWER_AUDIT, and many domain-specific audit/history tables.

summary: Epic provides the most comprehensive EHI export documentation of any EHR vendor. The export produces TSV files from Epic's Clarity database, with 7,672 tables documented at field level (column name, data type, description, primary key, discontinued status). Documentation is available as both an online browsable index and a downloadable ZIP of HTML files. Coverage spans all EHI categories: clinical data, secure messages (82 MyChart tables), billing (698+ tables), insurance (215+ tables), appointments, documents/images (including DICOM), and audit trails (157+ tables). No anti-bot protection, no login required, no JavaScript needed. This is a genuine database-native export, not a FHIR re-export.
